hero.title: Hi, I'm Charles!
hero.p0: Full stack wizard, student, and entrepreneur
hero.des0: I'm a 3rd year computer science specializing in SWE, AI, and business at the University of Waterloo.
hero.des1: I love collaborating in teams to create high-quality and sophisticated software.
hero.des2: My preferred tech stack involves React, NodeJS, and GraphQL, though I'm always excited to flex my other muscles.
hero.des3: I'm currently learning about genetic algorithms and developing a starcraft 2 AI with RL and SL.

projects.title: Projects
projects.description: Here are some of my favourite projects I've lead and developed. Not only were they super fun to code, but many of them are providing utilty to real people today!

msmr.subtitle: Contracted by Ryerson University
msmr.description: Blog and research sharing web app under the MSMR brand belonging to Dr. Jenny Liu.

uwcribs.subtitle: Waterloo Student Housing Aggregator
uwcribs.description: Instead of scrolling through Facebook endlessly every term to find a suitable place to live, we aggregated all available listings in a search engine to meet your specific needs.

squiggles.subtitle: Interactive Social Network Graph
squiggles.description: Discover hidden relationships on Twitter by visualizing our shortest path, page rank, and proximity based sorting algorithms on a graph interface.

skills.title: Skills
skills.description: Though I'm always excited to use the latest and greatest technologies, these are my tried and tested go to tools when building any project.

experience.title: Experience
experience.description: I've had the honour of working at these amazing companies. Hopefully your company will be there too.

contact.title: Want to connect?
contact.description: I really appreciate it when people go out of their way to get in touch. I'll make sure to get back to you as soon as possible!

footer: Crafted with NextJS, TailwindCSS, and Lots of ❤️
